snippet: Rajon Rondo had 14 points, 11 rebounds and 10 assists as the Boston Celtics overcame a 19-point deficit against the Atlanta Hawks.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Boston Celtics beat Atlanta Hawks, 89-81; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Rajon Rondo had 14 points, 11 rebounds and 10 assists as the Boston Celtics overcame a 19-point deficit against the Atlanta Hawks.

headline.seo: Rajon Rondo’s Triple-Double Rallies Celtics Over Hawks
headline.main: Celtics Stop Bickering and Rally to Victory
headline.print_headline: Celtics Stop Bickering And Rally To Victory
